channel.title: ABC15 Arizona | Phoenix AZ | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/ABC15

item.title: JUST IN: A jury has found an ex-politician guilty of murder
item.description: JUST IN: A jury has found an ex-politician guilty of murder in the 2022 killing of a Las Vegas investigative reporter.

item.title: The housing market in metro Phoenix has achieved balance — s
item.description: The housing market in metro Phoenix has achieved balance — something that hasn't happened since 2014.

item.title: Republican Vice President nominee JD Vance is expected to at
item.description: Republican Vice President nominee JD Vance is expected to attend a political event at a Mesa church on September 4.
